author: courant.com
title: High School Soccer: Glastonbury Tops Farmington
text:
Caption Glastonbury Tops Farmington Brad Horrigan / Hartford Courant Glastonbury's Alexander Calafiore, right, battles Farmington's John DiTomasso at Glastonbury High School Thursday afternoon. Glastonbury won the game 2-0.
Glastonbury's Alexander Calafiore, right, battles Farmington's John DiTomasso at Glastonbury High School Thursday afternoon. Glastonbury won the game 2-0.
(Brad Horrigan / Hartford Courant) Glastonbury Tops Farmington Brad Horrigan / Hartford Courant Glastonbury's Josh Daniewicz, right, looks to find a teammate at Glastonbury High School Thursday afternoon. Glastonbury won the game 2-0.
Glastonbury's Josh Daniewicz, right, looks to find a teammate at Glastonbury High School Thursday afternoon. Glastonbury won the game 2-0.
(Brad Horrigan / Hartford Courant) See more galleries Glastonbury boys soccer beat Farmington 2-0 in a hard fought game Thursday afternoon.
Brad Horrigan This photo gallery is featured in these articles: High School Sports Glastonbury Boys Soccer Scores Two Second Half Goals To Beat Farmington, 2-0
